aegis-fighter.name: Aegis Fighter
aegis-fighter.description: Aegis Fighters maintain the front line by fighting at close range, alternating between offensive and defensive shield skills to protect themselves and their allies.

uniqueMechanic.name: Shield Gauge
uniqueMechanic.value: The shield gauge will be consumed when blocking damage or parrying enemies. When the gauge is depleted, you become guard-broken and cannot use shield-related skills for a period of time.

blast-archer.name: Blast Archer
blast-archer.description: Blast Archers attack from a range with their bow and are adept at supporting the party. They adapt their fighting style based on the situation through techniques such as weak point targeting and area-of-effect attacks.

uniqueMechanic.name: Impeccable Aim
uniqueMechanic.value: Take manual aim to locate enemy weak points, which inflict additional damage when hit.

spell-caster.name: Spell Caster
spell-caster.description: Spell Casters can learn elemental attacks that manipulate fire, ice and lightning. Their high damage and elemental effects are even more influential when fighting with a party.

uniqueMechanic.name: Engram's Blessing
uniqueMechanic.value: Tactical skills have no cooldown but instead consume EP gauge. EP can be charged, but will leave you vulnerable while doing so.

twin-striker.name: Twin Striker
twin-striker.description: Twin Strikers use their dual axes to unleash a flurry of close-range attacks. By repeatedly attacking, their damage increases further beyond its limits.

uniqueMechanic.name: Combo Meter
uniqueMechanic.value: Damaging enemies increases the combo meter, which multiplies your damage. Getting knocked down will reset the combo meter to 0.

index.title: Classes
index.description:
